00100         // struct must not be larger then 32 bit because of DataItem usage
00101         struct Persist {
00102             UINT8  m_day;
00103             UINT8  m_month;
00104             UINT16 m_year;
00105         };

00219         template <class T> 
00220         T AdjustRange(T value, T range) {
00221             if (value < 0)
00222                 value = 0;
00223             else if (value > range)
00224                 value = range;
00225 
00226             return value;
00227         }
